ValidationRule.description: This will prevent a User from selecting an incorrect Status if the Property has been funded
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Approved_Advance_Amount_Used__c > 0, ISCHANGED(Status__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Due Diligence'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Closing'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'On Hold'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Cancelled') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You have selected an invalid Status for a funded Property
